About Bitcoin Cash

Over the past few years, a bitter technical and political debate has intensified in the space over how the first-mover cryptocurrency should proceed development-wise. This bitter debate came to a head in 2017 in the form of the August 1st hard fork of Bitcoin, which means there was then the legacy Bitcoin and the newly split-off Bitcoin Cash (BCH).
